name: LandeRaid
description:
Welcome to LandeRaid, private!

Use your trustworthy Landing Unit to land literally anywhere!

Use your imagination and creativity to avoid numerous obstacles and hazards!

Make sure to get to the end at least partially!

CONTROLS:

Cursors / WASD  activate engines

Space allows to pick/drop objects

R restart the level

Escape allows to quit the level or quit the game
